text: @realDonaldTrump 1 out of 3 covid19 deaths on the entire planet are in America yet this self-absorbed clown pushes for more. It won't help you. Most Americans polled say they will NOT go to a restaurant/gym/public event at this time. No jobs, dead loved ones, no end in sight. You're a failure.
